Equipment Actions.Action 1: Shortsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing plus 10 Poison
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Hand Crossbow, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 30/120ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing and can poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Drow makes 2 Shortsword attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Parry, The Drow can parry a melee weapon attack it can see, Reaction

Abilities.Ability 1: Fey Ancestry, The Drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can not put the Drow to sleep
Abilities.Ability 2: Innate Spellcasting, The Drow can innately cast a few spells, requiring no material components
Abilities.Ability 3: Sunlight Sensitivity, The Drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight while in Sunlight
